data.name: AimsOfTreatment
data.value: 6.3 Purpose of treatments

data.name: AllFonctionality
data.value: In order to benefit from the functionalities of the website, you must create an account using the online formulaire created in this purpose. You are free to modify the communicated personal information at any time. The access to your account can be done through the capture of your identifier and associated password, which you alone assume confidentiality. The use of the website after you registered is valuable for an unlimited time. We keep the possibility to stop it at any time, by electronic mailing, on condition of a reasonable notice. In case of non-respect of inherent obligations to your responsibility above cited, the access to your personal space can be, immediately and without notice, temporarily or permanently suspended by deactivating your account, without prejudice from our other rights.

data.name: Changes
data.value: 4. Modifications to this agreement

data.name: ChangesCgu
data.value: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to change, modify or otherwise alter these terms and conditions at any time. Such modifications shall become effective immediately upon the posting thereof. You must review this agreement on a regular basis to keep yourself apprised of any changes. Each use of this website will then be submitted to the terms of use applicable at that time.

data.name: EWorkySupportYourProduct
data.value: Give the feeling by any mean that eWorky supports your products or services;

data.name: FakeRevervations
data.value: Execute false booking, fraudulent or speculative, or booking by anticipating a demand;

data.name: FalseInformations
data.value: Insert false and or non-pertinent information in our website;

data.name: GoodFaithInformation
data.value: The information on this site are published in good faith and are frequently checked and updated. However, we cannot guarantee that they are complete and exact. We cannot check and we have not checked the accuracy of the information transmitted by the providers. We cannot be held for responsible of mistakes or oversights on the website, not toward you, and not toward third parties. We have the right to modify, update or erase any information on the website without prior authorization. We do not guarantee that this website works in an uninterrupted way and without mistakes, nor that the information and any other content available from this website are exempts of viruses or other dangerous component. We do not guarantee nor certify the adequation of the information, products and services on this website for any goal. eWorky website is provisioned in the current state and according to its availability. You shall assume all the risks related to the use of this website. We will not be responsible of mistakes, oversights or false information and refuse to accept any responsibility concerning those information, in the limits admitted by the law. All the pictures used on this website are only there in an illustration purpose and cannot be considered as accurate representation of installations, hosting or services actually offered.

data.name: Inscription
data.value: 5. Registering

data.name: InscriptionChild
data.value: 5.1 Registering

data.name: MandatoryInscription
data.value: Data identified as being compulsory during registration are necessary in order to benefit from the website functionalities. Data collected automatically by the website allow us to do statistics concerning visits of our web pages, and do an efficient partial geographic localization of our users.

data.name: NegativeEffectForWebsite
data.value: Using this website in a way that could, from our point of view, affect negatively performances or functionalities of this website, or any other informatics system or network used by eWorky, or that users or clients/users registered on eWorky website may be affected;

data.name: NoHacking
data.value: Load or broadcast on the website or use any equipment, software or process containing viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bomb or any other program or process aiming at damaging, interfering or attempt to interfere with the normal functioning of this website, or appropriate this website or any system, or also use any mean to cause a saturation of our systems or affect the rights of a third party;

data.name: NotForChild
data.value: Children aged under 13 are not allowed to register on the website. If you are less than 13 years old, please do not use or access to this website by any mean. If you are a parent or the legal representative of a child under 13 years old who would have registered on the website, thank you for sending us an e-mail with the information needed to cancel the registration of the child. In this e-mail, please include your full name and address, the full name and address of the child, the nature of your relationship with the child, your phone number (day and evening), your electronic address and a signed attestation indicating that you are a parent or a legal representative. eWorky reserve the right to search additionnal information in order to check your identity and the nature of your relationship with the child. Those information will only be used in order to check that you are indeed a parent or a legal representative of the child.

data.name: NotLegalPublication
data.value: Load or broadcast on the website or use any equipment, software or process containing viruses, Trojan horses, worms, time bomb or any other program or process aiming at damaging, interfering or attempt to interfere with the normal functioning of this website, or appropriate this website or any system, or also use any mean to cause a saturation of our systems or affect the rights of a third party;

data.name: NoUseWithoutYourConsentement
data.value: Your data will not be communicated to third parties without your authorization. You are however informed that they could be disclosed in application to a law, a regulation or accordingly to a decision of a reglementary or judiciary competent authority, as and if required, for eWorky, in order to protect its rights and interests.

data.name: SafeDataForEWorky
data.value: eWorky gives special importance to the security of your data and implements any appropriated measure in order to reduce risks of losing, deteriorating, or any inappropriate use of those data.

data.name: SaturationOfTheSite
data.value: Use softwares, routines or equipments hindering the functioning of this website or trying to do so, take any action that could lead to a saturation of our systems, or hide the origin of the information available on our website.

data.name: ServerDataRetention
data.value: Data are stocked by the host website identified in paragraph 1 and are kept for the strictly necessary time to the realization of the finalities above cited. After this time, they will be kept only for statistical purpose and will not used, for any nature.

data.name: SpeechCgu
data.value: By visiting and/or using this website, you accept the following terms of use. We recommend you to read them carefully. If you disagree with one of the stipulations of the following terms of use, you shall not visit and/or use this website. The name and logo of eWorky, as well as all the graphic elements and associated slogans, are trademarks and/or are distinguishing marks of their owner. All the rights are thus reserved to them. All the copyrights and other intellectual properties related to the content of this website, including the HTML codes, texts, photography and other pictures are property of eWorky or their owner granted us a license to use them. If you wish to use information or contents presented in our website, you should obtain our written authorization first or, if necessary those of the rights owner of the content in question. It is forbidden to modify, copy, broadcast, present, execute, publish, license any software or information obtained from this website, as well as create derivate work of the foresaid elements. In the case where it would be expressly permitted to realizer copy or transmissions, it is forbidden to modify or erase any mention related to the author or copyrights. Any mention on this website to products, services, process, distinguishing marks, trademarks or any third party related information available on this website does not imply nor constitute any approbation or support from us. Links to external websites runned by other entities are only furnished for your convenience. eWorky is not responsible for products, services, process, distinguish marks, trademarks or any other information provisioned by third parties on their website or by any other mean. The fact that our website contains hyperlinks to other websites does not imply the approbation of the content provided on those websites nor any other form of association with their runner. It is forbidden to use this website for activities breaking the law, reflecting on the rights of third parties or contravening standards, related requirements to the content or dispositions adopted par any authority involved. It is forbidden to use our website in a way that bothers, offends, slanders or threatens third parties. You exempt of any responsibility and guarantee us for any demand, legal proceeding and obligation, action for redress, costs or expenses due to the use of this website by yourself or any third party using your identifiants or password. If eWorky has not given you expressly mentioned authorization, or if the applicable law does not impose eWorky to give such an authorization, it is forbidden, without the prior written consent of eWorky, to:

data.name: TraitedCollectedDatas
data.value: Collected and treated data are those that you voluntary transmit us, and concern, at least, your identifier and a valid electronic address. Automatically collected data are your IP address (your computer’s address), excluding any other. You are informed that the website may implement an automatic tracking process (cookie), to which you can put obstacle, if you are not a registered user, by modifying the concerned parameters in your internet browser.
